story_ch0064_00_rival_02_01000/2401_1201: Time to attack! Everyone ready?
Yeah! Ready when you are!

I knew you’d have no trouble catching up, Tina.
You’ve already got the hang of these Pasio-style
team battles.

That said, I can’t afford to lose!
Come on, everyone!
Yeah!
Wait, Paulo. Rockruff looks tired.

Shouldn’t we heal him up? He’s not looking
so good...

(Right now, Rockruff’s stamina is low, so if I have
him attack, he might get knocked out.)

(On top of that, it’d be putting a lot of pressure
on him.)
(But...that’s the only way we can win here.)
That is what it means to think efficiently.

An incomplete spirit will only get in the way of
making the right choices.
No. No need to heal him.
Huh? But—
Ready or not, here we come!

(Even if Rockruff faints, we can still win as long
as we take out Tina’s Flareon.)
Rockruff! Jump in and attack!
What?!
Oh no!
He risked everything on that counterattack!
That was really reckless, Paulo...

But it did take the other team’s leader out of the
picture! Now’s our chance!
All right! We won!
Aw, man... We lost.
(We won...)
(This approach works.)
